entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Hinton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Jasper Warden Station 11:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 60 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
